election_record.label: Massachusetts 1813 House of Representatives, Westborough

overview.note: "The Friends of Peace of this town, have this day answered the misrepresentations of the Chronicle's 'Spirited Proceedings' - They have elected Major Moses Grant, a firm Federal Republican to represent them in the room of Simeon Bellows. It is about eighteen years since this town has been represented by a Federalist." Columbian Centinel. Massachusetts Federalist (Boston, MA). May 5, 1813.
"Major Grout (not Grant) is the representative of Westborough." Columbian Centinel. Massachusetts Federalist (Boston, MA). May 12, 1813.

election_record.reference: Columbian Centinel. Massachusetts Federalist (Boston, MA). May 5, 1813.
Columbian Centinel. Massachusetts Federalist (Boston, MA). May 12, 1813.
